gobblin.compaction.verify

Class InputRecordCountHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.compaction.verify.InputRecordCountHelper

  • public class InputRecordCountHelper
extends Object
    A class helps to calculate, serialize, deserialize record count. By using IngestionRecordCountProvider, the default input file name should in in format {file_name}.{record_count}.{extension}. For example, given a file path: "/a/b/c/file.123.avro", the record count will be 123.
